subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Josh Howard scored 26 points and the Dallas Mavericks overcame the loss of Dirk Nowitzki to defeat the visiting Toronto Raptors, 117-98, Wednesday night for their 11th consecutive victory.
snippet: Josh Howard scored 26 points and the Dallas Mavericks overcame the loss of Dirk Nowitzki to defeat the visiting Toronto Raptors, 117-98, Wednesday night for their 11th consecutive victory.
